cers_districts.state: The Dadra And Nagar Haveli And Daman And Diu

mobile_van_optimizer.description: Deploy AI-optimized mobile Aadhaar enrollment vans to high-risk districts during non-harvest seasons

deployment_strategy.timing: Avoid harvest months (April, May, October, November)

proactive_alerts.description: SMS/WhatsApp-based alerts to citizens in districts with bio_completion_rate < 80%
proactive_alerts.message_template: Your Aadhaar biometric update is due. Visit nearest center or use mobile van service. Free and mandatory for benefit continuity.

capacity_building.description: Upgrade enrollment centers and train operators in high-volatility districts
interventions: Extended operating hours during peak seasons

seasonal_planning.description: Pre-emptive resource allocation based on seasonal patterns
seasonal_planning.harvest_season_strategy: Deploy 50% more resources in non-harvest months (Dec-Mar, Jun-Sep)
seasonal_planning.quarter_end_strategy: Staff temporary centers in last 2 weeks of quarters
seasonal_planning.festival_period_prep: Mobile camps 1 month before major festivals (Diwali, Holi, Eid)

ease_of_living_improvements.reduced_travel_distance: 15-20 km average savings per citizen (mobile vans bring service closer)
ease_of_living_improvements.reduced_wait_times: 40% reduction in average wait time at enrollment centers
ease_of_living_improvements.proactive_communication: Citizens notified before benefits are at risk
ease_of_living_improvements.benefit_continuity: 61 citizens maintain uninterrupted access to benefits
